instructions: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Performed using a barbell or dumbbells on a flat bench.
A fundamental lower-body exercise that strengthens the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.
A full-body movement that primarily targets the lower back, hamstrings, and glutes.
A bodyweight exercise that targets the upper back and biceps by pulling up to a bar.
A pressing movement that strengthens the deltoids and triceps by pushing a weight overhead.
An isolation exercise that targets the biceps by curling a dumbbell toward the shoulders.
A bodyweight exercise that targets the triceps by lowering and raising the body using parallel bars.
A unilateral leg exercise that improves balance and strength.
An isometric core exercise that strengthens the abs, lower back, and shoulders.
A rotational core exercise that targets the obliques.
